sickness:
Asthma is a commom long-term condition that can cause coughing, wheezing, chest tightness and breathlessness.
What causes asthma?
 Asthma is caused by inflammation of the small tubes, called bronchi, which carry air in and out of the lungs. If you have asthma, the bronchi will be inflamed and more sensentive than normal.
 Asthma Triggers 
 house dust mite
 animal fur
 pollen
 cigarette smoke
 exercise 
 viral infections 
 While there is no cure for asthma but it is controllable and reversible eith treatment.
